short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add custom context buttons to ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "ChatGPT Context Injector:  Customize your ChatGPT experience!  Save and access frequently used information, project details, or code snippets with a click.  Stay organized and focused on the task at hand."
